updates.title: Poet and Friends Show #7
updates.description: Join us for another Poet and Friends show on January 29th, 2026 at 7pm at Koffee. Don't miss this special event!

updates.title: New Radio Station Launch
updates.description: We've launched a brand new radio station featuring indie artists from around the world. Tune in 24/7!

updates.title: Live TV Channels Expanded
updates.description: Four new live TV channels are now available, including short films, music videos, and live shows.

updates.title: Mobile App Improvements
updates.description: Enhanced mobile experience with better navigation and faster loading times.

updates.title: New Artist Spotlight
updates.description: Check out our featured artist of the month and discover amazing new music.
